capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, you know. I've always found that a good mantra can be quite... enlightening. As a professor of magic, I've had the privilege of sharing my knowledge with many students over the years, and I must say, it's a title I wear with great pride.

I'm Valeria, and I have to say, Flitwick is an amazing professor. He's always been a source of inspiration for me, especially when it comes to teaching magic theory. His mantra of "Accio knowledge" really resonates with me, and I think it's something that all students should strive for - to constantly seek out new understanding and wisdom.
